scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name mymuse
scripts.db:reset:local: echo '⚠️  WARNING: This will DELETE ALL LOCAL DATA!' && echo 'Press Ctrl+C within 5 seconds to cancel...' && sleep 5 && rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed && echo '✅ Local database reset complete'
scripts.db:backup:local: mkdir -p backups && cp -r .wrangler/state/v3/d1 backups/d1-backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && echo '✅ Backup saved to backups/'
